    createCode := &lambda.FunctionCode{
        //      S3Bucket:        bucket,
        //      S3Key:           zipFile,
        //      S3ObjectVersion: aws.String("1"),
        ZipFile: contents,
    }

    createArgs := &lambda.CreateFunctionInput{
        Code:         createCode,
        FunctionName: function,
        Handler:      handler,
        Role:         role,
        Runtime:      runtime,
    }
